imdb.plot outline: Perfect Teeth is an animated sitcom for adults starring the Puig-Martinez, an ordinary middle-class family who live in the suburbs of Barcelona. It's an ironic portrayal of subjects that affect contemporary society. Marta - the mother, is a dentist who would love her family to be as perfect and fabulous as a perfect denture. But like little cavities, life's problems threaten to destabilize the family's apparent happiness.
imdb.title: Perfect Teeth
plot: _Perfect Teeth_ (qv) is an animated sitcom for adults starring the Puig-Martinez, an ordinary middle-class family who live in the suburbs of Barcelona. It's an ironic portrayal of subjects that affect contemporary society. Marta - the mother, is a dentist who would love her family to be as perfect and fabulous as a perfect denture. But like little cavities, life's problems threaten to destabilize the family's apparent happiness.
